name: Cubathon (HUNNYB)
description:
*** No Timers, No Fuel *** Just pure endless fun!

FEATURES
- Third person camera view
- 6 Cubes to choose from (WILL ADD MORE IN UPDATES)
- Career mode with 30+ missions
- Support for 1 language

FOLLOW US
* https://www.instagram.com/prototype.studios/


Cubathon will be updated regularly with your suggestions. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
